general.colossalchests.description: For when regular chests are too small.
advancement.colossalchests.obsidian.desc: Form an Dark Rune Colossal Chest
advancement.colossalchests.large.wood.de: Form a wooden Colossal Chest of at least 10x10x10
Form a Aluminum Colossal Chest of at least 10x10x10
advancement.colossalchests.large.iron.de: Form an Nickel Colossal Chest of at least 10x10x10
Form a Rune Colossal Chest of at least 10x10x10
advancement.colossalchests.large.gold.de: Form an Amethyst Colossal Chest of at least 10x10x10
advancement.colossalchests.large.diamond: Form a Cobalt Colossal Chest of at least 10x10x10
advancement.colossalchests.large.obsidia: Form a Dark Rune Colossal Chest of at least 10x10x10
block.colossalchests.colossal_chest.info: Exactly one required to build a Colossal Chest structure
block.colossalchests.chest_wall.info: Used to build a Colossal Chest structure
block.colossalchests.interface.info: To interact with pipes and hoppers
item.colossalchests.upgrade_tool.info: Upgrade a Colossal Chest to the next tier when having all required items in your inventory.
item.colossalchests.upgrade_tool_reverse: Downgrade a Colossal Chest to the previous tier when having all required items in your inventory. WARNING: items may pop out if the chest becomes too small for the contents.
multiblock.colossalchests.error.material: Found a block of material %s at %s, while %s was expected.
multiblock.colossalchests.error.upgrade: Not enough items for upgrading this chest, you need %s cores, %s interfaces and %s walls of at least the material %s.
multiblock.colossalchests.error.upgradeL: You can not transform this chest anymore.
